00020 
00021 XMagnetPS::XMagnetPS(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00022                      const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00023                      const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00024                      const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00025                      const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00026     XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00027     m_field(create<XScalarEntry>("Field", false,
00028                                  dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00029     m_current(create<XScalarEntry>("Current", false, 
00030                                    dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00031     m_targetField(create<XDoubleNode>("TargetField", true)),
00032     m_sweepRate(create<XDoubleNode>("SweepRate", true)),
00033     m_allowPersistent(create<XBoolNode>("AllowPersistent", true)),
00034     m_stabilized(create<XDoubleNode>("Stabilized", true)),
00035     m_magnetField(create<XDoubleNode>("MagnetField", true)),
00036     m_outputField(create<XDoubleNode>("OutpuField", true)),
00037     m_outputCurrent(create<XDoubleNode>("OutputCurrent", true)),
00038     m_outputVolt(create<XDoubleNode>("OutputVolt", true)),
00039     m_pcsHeater(create<XBoolNode>("PCSHeater", true)),
00040     m_persistent(create<XBoolNode>("Persistent", true)),
00041     m_form(new FrmMagnetPS(g_pFrmMain)),
00042     m_statusPrinter(XStatusPrinter::create(m_form.get()))
00043 {
00044     scalarentries->insert(m_field);
00045     scalarentries->insert(m_current);
00046     m_form->statusBar()->hide();
00047     m_form->setWindowTitle(XString("Magnet Power Supply - " + getLabel() ));
00048   
00049     m_conAllowPersistent = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(
00050         allowPersistent(), m_form->m_ckbAllowPersistent);
00051     m_conTargetField = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(
00052         targetField(), m_form->m_edTargetField);
00053     m_conSweepRate = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(
00054         sweepRate(), m_form->m_edSweepRate);
00055     m_conMagnetField = xqcon_create<XQLCDNumberConnector>(
00056         magnetField(), m_form->m_lcdMagnetField);
00057     m_conOutputField = xqcon_create<XQLCDNumberConnector>(
00058         outputField(), m_form->m_lcdOutputField);
00059     m_conOutputCurrent= xqcon_create<XQLCDNumberConnector>(
00060         outputCurrent(), m_form->m_lcdCurrent);
00061     m_conOutputVolt = xqcon_create<XQLCDNumberConnector>(
00062         outputVolt(), m_form->m_lcdVoltage);
00063     m_conPCSH = xqcon_create<XKLedConnector>(
00064         pcsHeater(), m_form->m_ledSwitchHeater);
00065     m_conPersist = xqcon_create<XKLedConnector>(
00066         persistent(), m_form->m_ledPersistent);
00067     allowPersistent()->value(false);
00068     targetField()->setUIEnabled(false);
00069     sweepRate()->setUIEnabled(false);
00070     targetField()->setUIEnabled(false);
00071     sweepRate()->setUIEnabled(false);
00072     allowPersistent()->setUIEnabled(false);
00073     //    Field->Value.Precision = 0.001;
00074     //    Current->Value.Precision = 0.0001;
00075 }
00076 void
00077 XMagnetPS::showForms() {
00078 //! impliment form->show() here
00079     m_form->show();
00080     m_form->raise();
00081 }
00082 
00083 void
00084 XMagnetPS::start()
00085 {
00086     m_thread.reset(new XThread<XMagnetPS>(shared_from_this(), &XMagnetPS::execute));
00087     m_thread->resume();
00088   
00089     targetField()->setUIEnabled(true);
00090     sweepRate()->setUIEnabled(true);
00091 }
00092 void
00093 XMagnetPS::stop()
00094 {
00095     targetField()->setUIEnabled(false);
00096     sweepRate()->setUIEnabled(false);
00097     allowPersistent()->setUIEnabled(false);
00098     
00099     if(m_thread) m_thread->terminate();
00100 //    m_thread->waitFor();
00101 //  thread must do interface()->close() at the end
00102 }
00103 
00104 void
00105 XMagnetPS::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00106 {
00107     m_magnetFieldRecorded = pop<float>();
00108     m_outputCurrentRecorded = pop<float>();
00109     m_field->value(m_magnetFieldRecorded);
00110     m_current->value(m_outputCurrentRecorded);
00111 }
00112 void
00113 XMagnetPS::visualize()
00114 {
00115     //! impliment extra codes which do not need write-lock of record
00116     //! record is read-locked
00117 }

00119 void
00120 XMagnetPS::onRateChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00121 {
00122     try {
00123         setRate(*sweepRate());
00124     }
00125     catch (XKameError &e) {
00126         e.print(getLabel() + "; ");
00127     }
00128 }
00129 
00130 void *
00131 XMagnetPS::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00132 {   
00133     double havg = 0.0;
00134     double dhavg = 0.0;
00135     double lasth = 0.0;
00136     XTime lasttime = XTime::now();
00137     const double pcsh_stab_period = 30.0;
00138     XTime pcsh_time = XTime::now();
00139     pcsh_time -= pcsh_stab_period;
00140     double field_resolution;
00141     bool is_pcs_fitted;
00142     bool last_pcsh;
00143   
00144     try {
00145         field_resolution = fieldResolution();
00146         is_pcs_fitted = isPCSFitted();
00147         sweepRate()->value(getSweepRate());
00148         targetField()->value(getTargetField());
00149         last_pcsh = isPCSHeaterOn();
00150     }
00151     catch (XKameError&e) {
00152         e.print(getLabel());
00153         afterStop();
00154         return NULL;
00155     }
00156 
00157     if(is_pcs_fitted ) allowPersistent()->setUIEnabled(true);
00158     m_lsnRate = sweepRate()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00159         shared_from_this(), &XMagnetPS::onRateChanged);
00160 
00161   
00162     while(!terminated)
00163     {
00164         msecsleep(10);
00165         double magnet_field;
00166         double output_field;
00167         double output_current;
00168         double output_volt;
00169         double target_field;
00170         bool pcs_heater = true;
00171         bool pcsh_stable = false;
00172       
00173         // try/catch exception of communication errors
00174         try {
00175             magnet_field = getMagnetField();
00176             output_field = getOutputField();
00177             output_current = getOutputCurrent();
00178             output_volt = getOutputVolt();
00179             target_field = getTargetField();
00180             if(is_pcs_fitted) {
00181                 pcs_heater = isPCSHeaterOn();
00182                 if(pcs_heater != last_pcsh)
00183                     pcsh_time = XTime::now();
00184                 last_pcsh = pcs_heater;
00185                 pcsh_stable = (XTime::now() - pcsh_time > pcsh_stab_period);
00186             }
00187         }
00188         catch (XKameError &e) {
00189             e.print(getLabel() + "; ");
00190             continue;
00191         }
00192         clearRaw();
00193         push((float)magnet_field);
00194         push((float)output_current);
00195  
00196         finishWritingRaw(XTime::now(), XTime::now());
00197       
00198         magnetField()->value(magnet_field);
00199         outputField()->value(output_field);
00200         outputCurrent()->value(output_current);
00201         outputVolt()->value(output_volt);
00202         pcsHeater()->value(pcs_heater && is_pcs_fitted);
00203 
00204         persistent()->value(!pcs_heater && pcsh_stable && is_pcs_fitted);
00205 
00206         //calicurate std. deviations in some periods
00207         XTime newtime = XTime::now();
00208         double dt = fabs(newtime - lasttime);
00209         lasttime = newtime;
00210         havg = (havg - magnet_field) * exp(-dt / 3.0) + magnet_field;
00211         stabilized()->value(fabs(havg - *targetField())); //stderr
00212       
00213         double dhdt = (magnet_field - lasth) / dt;
00214         lasth = magnet_field;
00215         dhavg = (dhavg - dhdt) * exp(-dt / 3.0) + dhdt;
00216       
00217         try {
00218             if(is_pcs_fitted)
00219             {
00220                 if(pcs_heater) {
00221                     //pcs heater is on
00222                     if(fabs(target_field - *targetField()) >= field_resolution) {
00223                         if(pcsh_stable) {
00224                             setPoint(*targetField());
00225                             toSetPoint();    
00226                         }
00227                     }
00228                     else {
00229                         if((fabs(dhavg) < field_resolution / 10) && 
00230                            (fabs(magnet_field - target_field) < field_resolution) &&
00231                            *allowPersistent() )
00232                         {
00233                             //field is not sweeping, and persistent is allowed
00234                             m_statusPrinter->printMessage(getLabel() + " " + 
00235                                                           i18n("Turning on Perisistent mode."));
00236                             pcsh_time = XTime::now();
00237                             toPersistent();
00238                         }
00239                     }
00240                 }
00241                 else {
00242                     //pcs heater if off
00243                     if(fabs(magnet_field - *targetField()) >= field_resolution) {
00244                         //start sweeping.
00245                         if(fabs(magnet_field - output_field) < field_resolution) {
00246                             if(fabs(target_field  - magnet_field) < field_resolution) {
00247                                 //ready to go non-persistent.
00248                                 m_statusPrinter->printMessage(getLabel() + " " + 
00249                                                               i18n("Non-Perisistent mode."));
00250                                 double h = getPersistentField();
00251                                 if(fabs(h - output_field) > field_resolution)
00252                                     throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(getLabel() + 
00253                                                                       i18n("Huh? Magnet field confusing."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00254                                 pcsh_time = XTime::now();
00255                                 toNonPersistent();
00256                             }
00257                         }
00258                         else {
00259                             //set output to persistent field.
00260                             if(pcsh_stable) {
00261                                 if(target_field != magnet_field)
00262                                     setPoint(magnet_field);
00263                                 toSetPoint();  
00264                             }
00265                         }
00266                     }
00267                     else {
00268                         if(pcsh_stable) {
00269                             toZero();
00270                         }
00271                     }
00272                 }
00273             }
00274             else {
00275                 // pcsh is not fitted.
00276                 if(fabs(target_field - *targetField()) >= field_resolution) {                
00277                     setPoint(*targetField());
00278                     toSetPoint();
00279                 }
00280             }
00281         }
00282         catch (XKameError &e) {
00283             e.print(getLabel());
00284         }
00285     }
00286  
00287     m_lsnRate.reset();
00288       
00289     afterStop();
00290     return NULL;
00291 }
